STORY_1:
A long time ago,
in a kingdom far far away...
STORY_2:
Monsters have started
appearing from the east,
 people are injured.
STORY_3:
And now your little brother is missing...
It's time to do something !
QUEST_1:
Hello young man !
So you want to help the village ?
If you bring me 6 coins
you'll have the magic staff !
QUEST_ENDED:
Well done youngling !
please use this magic staff with care.
TUTO_STAFF_MOBILE:
YOU NOW HAVE THE MAGIC STAFF !
Touch the spell on the bottom left to use it !
TUTO_STAFF_DESKTOP:
YOU NOW HAVE THE MAGIC STAFF !
Press [SPACE] to use it
